messages.body: $TSLA "Tesla stock going to $4,000 — that would be an increase of 1,100%: Money manager Catherine Wood" https://www.cnbc.com/2018/02/07/ark-chief-catherine-wood-sees-tesla-stock-going-to-4000.html

links.title: Money manager known for bold calls sees Tesla going to $4,000 - an increase of 1,100%
links.description: David McNew | AFP | Getty Images Ark Investment Management founder and CEO Catherine Wood, a money manager known for making bold calls, told CNBC on Wednesday she believes Tesla stock will one day trade at $4,000 per share. "If we're right, this stock in our models is going to $4,000," Wood said in a "Squawk Box" interview.
